meanings.definition: The state or quality of being intense.
meanings.sent1: The tensities of the storm kept everyone indoors.
meanings.sent2: The tensities in the room were palpable as the suspense grew.
meanings.sent3: The tensities of the situation made everyone hold their breath.
meanings.sent4: The tensities in the air crackled like electricity.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the tensities of the sunset in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The degree of strength or force in a feeling or action.
meanings.sent1: The tensities of her emotions overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent2: The tensities of his determination led him to success.
meanings.sent3: The tensities of the argument diffused when they started laughing.
meanings.sent4: The tensities of the music resonated deep within her soul.
meanings.sent5: The tensities of the race pushed the athletes to their limits.
